motivation.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
motivation.author: John Lennon

motivation.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivation.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
motivation.author: Aristotle

success.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
success.author: Walt Disney

success.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
success.author: Tony Robbins

inspiration.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
inspiration.author: Oscar Wilde

inspiration.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
inspiration.author: Wayne Gretzky

inspiration.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
inspiration.author: Henry Ford

wisdom.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
wisdom.author: Robert Frost

wisdom.text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
wisdom.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

wisdom.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
wisdom.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

wisdom.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

technology.text: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
technology.author: Christian Lous Lange

technology.text: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
technology.author: Bill Gates

technology.text: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
technology.author: Arthur C. Clarke

technology.text: The human spirit must prevail over technology.
technology.author: Albert Einstein

technology.text: First we build the tools, then they build us.
technology.author: Marshall McLuhan
